post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Number: 4880237

Title: Computer programmer (Computer programmer) (NOC: 2174)

Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day

Salary: $30.00 Hourly for 40 hours per week, Other Benefits

Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible

Location: Toronto, Ontario (1 vacancy)

Skill Requirements:

Education: Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training

Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Associate Computing Professional (ACP), Certified Computer Programmer (CCP), Registration as a Professional Engineer

Experience: 5 years or more

Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English

Work Setting: Research and development institution

Specific Skills: Write, modify, integrate and test software code, Maintain existing computer programs by making modifications as required, Program animation software to predefined specifications for interactive CDs, DVDs, video game cartridges and internet-based applications

Programming Languages: Visual Basic, SQL

Computer and Technology Knowledge: Windows, Software development

Applications: Flash

Employer: ColorKeys

How to Apply:

Please apply for this job only in the manner specified by the employer. Failure to do so may result in your application not being properly considered for the position.

By E-mail: ralph@colorkeys.com
Business Profile: After school music lessons, music book developer and publisher.

Advertised until: 2010/03/08
post.title: Computer programmer(Visual Basic + SQL)
